description: This module will examine the history of Buddhism in Southeast Asia, concentrating on the mainland countries. We will look at the Buddhist kingdoms of the past to study the impact of religion on their culture and society. For the colonial period, links between Buddhism and nationalism will be considered. Finally, we will have an overview of the role of Buddhism in mainland Southeast Asia today. This module is for anyone interested in Southeast Asia history and culture. It emphasizes a historical approach to studying religion, and students from any religious and cultural background are welcome.
title: Buddhism in Southeast Asian History
